resources.string: HTlCatcher is a Flappy-Bird-inspired game where you have to navigate your avatar through approaching obstacles as long as possible. The longer you manage to navigate through them, the more points you get. Additionally, you can try to catch passing HTL logos to acquire even more points.
You can control your avatar by tapping on the display. Upon every tap, your character jumps up a bit but then immediately falls back down due to gravitational affectation.
Take a photo and get started!
(The app needs access to your camera for this)
(The app needs access to your gallery for this)
The default logo, which grants 10 points upon collecting but does not grant any special buffs.
A golden bonus logo, grants 25 points when collected. (No buffs either)
Upon collecting, this logo grants 10 points and a shield that ignores one hit.
Grants a multiplier effect which doubles all points gained for a specific duration.
Inverts the gravity for a short duration.
By tapping \"Submit\" you accept that the entered name and your reached score will be shared on the website catcher.htl.codes.
